                      IPhysicalTopologyListener l)
        Description copied from interface: IPhysicalTopologyMonitor
        Add a listener to receive notifications of new or removed application peers. Notifications concerning the addition/removal of the given app must not be sent.
        Specified by:
        addPeerListener in interface IPhysicalTopologyMonitor

        Description copied from interface: IPhysicalTopology

      • getReachablePeers

        public java.util.Set<IApplicationDescriptor> getReachablePeers(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                                                      int hops)
        Description copied from interface: IPhysicalTopology
        Get the list of peers that are reachable within the given number of hops.
        Specified by:
        getReachablePeers in interface IPhysicalTopology
        hops - the number of network links to traverse. 0 or larger, where 0 means peers on the same host (i.e. without a hop between NICs).
        Returns:
        never null, but perhaps empty. The returned set does not include the given descriptor.

      • register

        public java.lang.Object register(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                        java.net.URI recvr)
                          throws DSMException
        Description copied from interface: IDistributedApplicationRegistry
        Register this URI with the given app. The combination of app name space and instance id should be unique within the registry.
        Specified by:
        register in interface IDistributedApplicationRegistry
        Parameters:
        app - app descriptor includes name space and instance id.
        recvr - URI that can be used to send tuples.
        Returns:
        a unique cookie for this registration or null if could not be stored.
        Throws:
        DSMException

        Description copied from interface: IDistributedApplicationRegistry

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws DSMException
        Description copied from interface: IDistributedApplicationRegistry
        Stop the registry. Any dynamic registrations that happen betweeen IDistributedApplicationRegistry.start() and IDistributedApplicationRegistry.stop() should be cleared from the registry so that the registry is effectively in its initialized stated.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface IDistributedApplicationRegistry
        Throws:
        DSMException
